pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with the Secretary General of the United Nations, Ban Ki-moon | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau met today with the Secretary General of the United Nations, Ban Ki-moon.

The Prime Minister thanked the Secretary General for his tireless service to the United Nations. He reiterated Canadaâ€™s commitment to support the international community in working for justice, security and equality on the global stage.

The Prime Minister and the Secretary General looked forward to their continued collaboration in addressing key global challenges such as climate change and the refugee crisis.
